original_title: Two men arrested for stealing from tourist
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Weligama Police arrested two men for stealing US $ 1,200/- from a Bangladesh traveler.
Sri Lanka Police said the Bangladeshi woman was staying at a hotel in Mirissa, and during her stay the men had stolen her money.
The suspects are from Denipitiya and Mirissa, and they will be produced to the Matara Magistrate's Court.
